title: What chair are you using for gaming?

embed.description: GAMING CHAIR BUYER'S GUIDE After long procrastination and constantly hearing about gaming chairs for about 4 years finally I decided to rest my case on gaming chairs and write down my experience with them. Back then I had no clue such thing even existed, I mean it's just a chair right?

body:
Hi! I'm looking for something better than my $50 Walmart office chair that I'm using right now and  these dxracer chairs look good. I'm 5'10'' 220lbs and drifting & iron series seem to fit. Can you share your own experience? Are they worth the money?
Thanks!
